sentences.en: A combination of interconnected circuit elements inseparably associated on or within a continuous substrate.
sentences.cn: 互连电路元件不可分离地连接在一块完整的基片上所构成的一种整体电路.

sentences.en: Holding our ground and extending it are inseparably connected.
sentences.cn: 保持阵地和发展阵地是不可分离的.

sentences.en: In his mind, religion and politics were inseparably intertwined.
sentences.cn: 在他心中，宗教与政治是密不可分地交织在一起的。

sentences.en: Objectives of project progress, investment and quality are correlated, constrained, considered each other and inseparably inter - connected.
sentences.cn: 项目的进度目标 、 投资目标和质量目标是相互关联 、 相互制约 、 相互兼顾、相辅相成的.

sentences.en: The connection between technology and current lifestyle is getting inseparably associated.
sentences.cn: 科技与生活的联系越来越紧密.

sentences.en: The content of fiction is inseparably interconnected with its form and structure.
sentences.cn: 小说的内容和结构形态互为因果,不可分割.
这两个不可分地连接在一起.

sentences.en: Throughout most of human history, mathematics and physics have been inseparably joined.
sentences.cn: 在人类历史的部分时期中, 数学与物理学几乎始终是不可分地联系在一起的.

words.tran_cn: [数] 不可分割的；不能分离的
不可分离的事物；形影不离的朋友
